DOC.brief_summary: This enhance safety surveillance study occur within military Service Member population . Primary Objective : - To evaluate rate suspect , probable , confirm myocarditis and/or pericarditis temporal association ACAM2000® vaccination . Secondary Objectives : - To evaluate rate cardiovascular adverse event temporal association ACAM2000® vaccination . - To evaluate rate neurological adverse event temporal association ACAM2000® vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Surveillance Study ACAM2000® Vaccinia Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: The Armed Forces Health Surveillance Activity ( AFHSA ) perform comprehensive health surveillance operation Defense Medical Surveillance System ( DMSS ) . Demographic medical information gather within monthly report DMSS collect approximately 100,000 200,000 military Service Members receive ACAM2000® smallpox vaccine .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Male female military personnel > = 17 year age . Have receive ACAM2000® smallpox vaccine . Exclusion Criteria :
